title: Design Process for Intelligent Web-Based Personalized Learning Pathways

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A language proficiency improvement program for professionals, offering personalized learning experiences in real-time online environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design learning pathways based on individual knowledge levels and preferences using system-provided ontologies
Learners can monitor and adjust their learning progress through real-time feedback
Learners can evaluate unit learning modules that reflect the IMS Learning Design standard
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
